Description: Advanced Petrochemical (known as: Advanced) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 2007. Advanced operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Commodity Chemicals and Independent Power Producers and Energy Traders. Advanced is based in Jubail, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 2005
